Module CAViewer
Package sample.model.rules.ruleloader.ruletree

Class Ruletree

java.lang.Object
sample.model.rules.ruleloader.Directive
sample.model.rules.ruleloader.RuleDirective
sample.model.rules.ruleloader.ruletree.Ruletree
public class Ruletree
extends RuleDirective
Implements Golly ruletrees with additional features such as arbitary neighbourhoods. See http://golly.sourceforge.net/Help/formats.html for more information.
